roleset.name: lend aid, credence to

role.descr: person, thing or project being supported

example.name: benefactive
example.text: The finding probably will support those who argue that the US should regulate the class of asbestos including crocidolite more closely.
example.arg: those who argue that the US should regulate the class of asbestos including crocidolite more closely.

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls admire-31.2, contiguous_location-47.8, help-72.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'support' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'help'
